thread.section_title: AMR Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AMR | amr.com.au
thread.title: kristy day

author: kristy day
title: kristy day
text:
My first purchase with AMR was just amazing! Their ordering system online was easy to use and everything I needed was easy to find, I was shocked at how cheap everything was, I was worried my salon was going to be empty and bare until I was able to purchase shock to full it but thanks to AMR they had everything under control and I need not to worry. The delivery was so quick I couldnt believe my order had arrived that quickly and everything I had ordered was there, it was unbelievable.
Thanks AMR I will only be making my purchases for my salon through you, theres no need to go anywhere else when you have service like that why would you.
